definition: sapwood (between vascular cambium and pith inside growing wood)
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: Sapwood is the lighter colored wood growing from inside the bark to the heartwood.
sentences.chinese: 邊材色澤較淺，是從樹皮到新材之間的木質部分。

sentences.english: Up-take of sapwood was obviously higher than that of heartwood.
sentences.chinese: 邊材上染率明顯高於心材。

sentences.english: Heart sapwood distinction was not obvious, chestnut brown.
sentences.chinese: 心邊材區別不明顯，材色慄褐色。

sentences.english: Partial self-produced sapwood, realizing low cost process.
sentences.chinese: 部分自產邊材，實現超低成本加工。

sentences.english: One or more layers of living and functional sapwood cells are periodically converted to heartwood.
sentences.chinese: 每個生長週期都有一或多層活的邊材細胞轉變成心材。

sentences.english: Sapwood contains xylem vessels, but not as strong as heartwood .
sentences.chinese: 邊材含有木質導管，但不如中心木質那樣堅硬。
